price: 43. Mpe kati na bango, baye bazali kotala yo. Boye yo nde okambaka bakufi miso, ata soki bazali kornona te?
arabic: وَمِنۡهُم مَّن يَنظُرُ إِلَيۡكَۚ أَفَأَنتَ تَهۡدِي ٱلۡعُمۡيَ وَلَوۡ كَانُواْ لَا يُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamin'hum man yanẓuru ilayka afa-anta tahdī al-ʿum'ya walaw kānū lā yub'ṣirūna
